name: ABDICATION
description:
Story: Set in a world where humans became extinct long ago, the few remaining robots struggle to survive in a harsh and unforgiving environment. The main character is a robot built for military purposes, but after a malfunction, he gains self-awareness and begins to question his purpose. As the robot traverses the snowy landscape, searching for its true self, you have to solve puzzles as you play

     DEMO

Controller:

Move : WADS / LeftAnaloge Gamepad

Interact: E / A Gamepad

Jumping: Space / X GamePad

Rolling: Q / B GamePad

Sprinting: LeftShift / L3 GamePad

Focus: TAB / R3 GamePad

Crouching: C / Y GamePad
